ygData.subject: Re: rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: ... In Ak Anon, near bank. You can get Gnomish Spirits, actually a few other places as well. High Pass hold, I THINK had it. Odd that. Toolbox is fixed, and
ygData.messageBody:
Enigma wrote:

> From: Enigma <enigma@...>
>
> My question is Where do you find the gnome spirits for the fire water (Or
> does any alcohol work?) and is the Tool box still bugged? AKA can't put in
> bank, drop, trade, etc? Also does anyone have a listing of what tinkering
> components there are? Are the Gizmos and sprockets used? I travel a lot
> as a monk and I have never seen ANY other books. I DO know there are 5
> volumes to the Alchemy books so maybe there are 5 to the tinkers. Though
> the alchemy ones are all in the same place.
>
> I want to set up a site on my page for tinkering so am gathering any info
> on it I can.
>
> <-- Enigma -->

In Ak'Anon, near bank. You can get Gnomish Spirits, actually a few other
places as well. High Pass hold, I THINK had it. Odd that. Toolbox is fixed,
and
number of slots has been increased. Gizmos and sprockets aren't used, well not

gizmos as far as I can tell, but that's limited information considering there
are
books I haven't seen.


-Zikkin
